dlc_id.description: [string]The id to the backend, if it exists

ability.description: The ability to play for this emote.

cancel_ability.description: The ability to play for this emote when its cancelled.

preview_anim_event.description: [string]The animation event to play for preview.

cancel_sync_anim_event.description: [string]The animation event to play when cancelled.

canceled_animation_time.description: Time to wait after starting to play a canceled animation.

input_config.description: Settings for if this emote has input options.

name_upper.description: [string]The name of the emote (upper-case LAMS entry key).

name_cased.description: [string]The name of the emote (mixed-case LAMS entry key).

wheel_icon.description: [material]The icon of the emote in the emote wheel.
